BR_text.BRsummary: [rllib] QMIX: No backprop on the (mixer) hypernetworks?
BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-h:h3>QMIX: No backprop on the (mixer) hypernetworks?</denchmark-h>
 
 <denchmark-h:h3>Source code / logs</denchmark-h>
 
 <denchmark-code>    # Setup optimizer
     self.params = list(self.model.parameters())
     self.loss = QMixLoss(self.model, self.target_model, self.mixer,
                          self.target_mixer, self.n_agents, self.n_actions,
                          self.config["double_q"], self.config["gamma"])
 </denchmark-code>

comments_0.comment_text: It looks like this is missing from the port: self.params += list(self.mixer.parameters())
